Description:
311946485 - You have failed to ensure so far as is reasonably practicable, the health safety and welfare at work of  your employees and those not in his employment in that risk of a fire or explosion involving Liquid Petroleum Gas (LPG) stored in your bulk tanks (Serial Number 271681 & Serial Number 272720) is either eliminated or, reduced so far as is reasonably practicable, in that you have failed to provide an adequate separation distance of 7.5 metres from the nearest combustible materials including redundant pallets of linoleum stored in this area prior to recycling.

311946532 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety, and welfare at work of all your employees who are operating machinery (including in-running nip points between rollers and or product and rollers on the ‘beam-out’ operating line). You have not: provided and maintained plant and systems of work that are safe and without risk to health as safeguarding arrangements are in need of fundamental review to ensure effective measures are in place to prevent access to danger.
